title: Celebrity X Factor gatecrashed by George Osborne leaving Louis Walsh and Olivia Olson stunned
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Louis Walsh and Olivia Olson were amazed when another famous face gatecrashed their recreation of a Love Actually scene.

The X Factor : Celebrity judge and contestant Olivia, a child star in the 2003 film, were recording on the street where former Chancellor George Osborne lives.

Louis joked they’d found a stand in for Love Actually’s Prime Minister, played by Hugh Grant.

The film PM stood up to a bullying US President...while George imposed austerity.

Louis tells the Mirror: “Olivia and I were re-creating the iconic Love Actually scene when he appears like he was playing the role of Hugh Grant! Turns out he is a huge X Factor: Celebrity fan.

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

"George could always join the celeb line-up.”

Bet he does a great rendition of Simply Red’s Money’s Too Tight To Mention.
description: The judge and Celebrity X Factor contestant Olivia were recording on the street where the former Chancellor lives
